entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a character in the story who is speaking to Snape. She mentions that she was entrusted by the Dark Lord with his most precious things.

entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius is Bellatrix's husband and is mentioned as someone who may have been responsible for something.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is Bellatrix's sister and is speaking to her in a low and deadly voice. She defends her husband.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a character who is being spoken to by Bellatrix. He mentions that he was following the Dark Lord's orders.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who would not have noticed if Snape had joined forces with the Death Eaters.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is a title given to Voldemort and is mentioned as someone who entrusted Bellatrix with his most precious things.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of followers of the Dark Lord and are mentioned as people Snape would have joined forces with.

entities.name: order of the phoenix
entities.description: The Order of the Phoenix is a group that is fighting against the Death Eaters and is mentioned by Bellatrix.

relationships.description: Bellatrix mentions that she was entrusted by the Dark Lord with his most precious things.
Snape mentions that he would have joined forces with the Death Eaters if Dumbledore had not noticed.
Bellatrix mentions that Dumbledore would not have noticed if Snape had joined forces with the Death Eaters.
Snape is mentioned as someone who fought against the Order of the Phoenix.
